translations: 征收额；征得的税；征收；财产扣押；征兵（levy 的复数）；所征来的军队
征收（税、罚款）；向……征收税（或罚款）；征兵；发动战争（levy 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: In Australia 60% of tax revenue is raised from such levies.
sentences.translation: 澳大利亚的所得税占经济总量的60%。

sentences.sentence: Other countries will follow, perhaps with performance-based levies.
sentences.translation: 其他国家将会效仿，也许征费水平会与业绩挂钩。

sentences.sentence: Yet, despite the levies in place, technology has a way of seeping in.
sentences.translation: 然而，尽管立了规矩，还是有办法搞到技术产品。
